com.ericbarnhill.jvcl

Class Boundaries

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericbarnhill.jvcl.Boundaries

  • public class Boundaries
extends java.lang.Object
    This class finishes boundaries for Unrolled and GPU methods. This allows the methods to run straightforwardly with boundaries cleaned up in a final step, according to preferred boundary condition specifications.
    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    ericbarnhill
    See Also:
    Unrolled, FDGPU

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Boundaries()

      Adds convolutions at boundaries for 2D Complex[][] vectorised to a 1D Complex[].

    • Method Detail

      • finishBoundaries1d

        public static double[] finishBoundaries1d(double[] fPad,
                          double[] g,
                          double[] r,
                          int gi,
                          int hgi,
                          int hgie,
                          int ri)
        Adds convolutions at boundaries for 1D double[].
        Parameters:
        fPad - padded original array
        g - kernel
        r - convolved result array
        gi - kernel width
        hgi - left kernel radius
        hgie - right kernel raduis
        ri - result length
        Returns:
        r with completed boundaries

      • finishBoundaries2d

        public static double[][] finishBoundaries2d(double[] fPad,
                            double[] g,
                            double[] r,
                            int gi,
                            int gj,
                            int hgi,
                            int hgie,
                            int hgj,
                            int hgje,
                            int ri,
                            int rj)
        Adds convolutions at boundaries for 2D double[][] vectorised to a 1D double[].
        Parameters:
        fPad - padded original array
        g - kernel
        r - convolved result array
        gi - kernel dim1 length
        gj - kernel dim2 length
        hgi - kernel dim1 start padding
        hgie - kernel dim1 end padding
        hgj - kernel dim2 start padding
        hgje - kernel dim2 end padding
        ri - result array dim 1
        rj - result array dim 2
        Returns:
        reference to r

      • finishBoundaries2d

        Adds convolutions at boundaries for 2D Complex[][] vectorised to a 1D Complex[].

        g - kernel
        r - convolved result array
        gi - kernel dim1 length
        gj - kernel dim2 length
        hgi - kernel dim1 left radius
        hgie - kernel dim1 right radius
        hgj - kernel dim2 left radius
        hgje - kernel dim2 right radius
        ri - result array dim 1
        rj - result array dim 2
        Returns:
        reference to r
